Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and provide exceptional value. I believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $100. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find this proposal appealing. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
